<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Incendiary Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=2078)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 259 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Mystery**
[Flames](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=16)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You surround yourself with a combustible aura. Each time a creature within the emanation takes fire damage, it catches on fire, taking 2d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The persistent damage increases by 1d4 and the radius of the emanation increases by 5 feet.
name: Incendiary Aura
